p: SARS-CoV-2 isolate ICGEB_FVG_S5 was obtained at ICGEB as previously described [ 18]. Plaque assay was performed by incubating dilutions of SARS-CoV-2 on Vero E6 monolayers at 37 °C for 1 h. These were then washed with phosphate buffered saline (PBS) and overlaid with DMEM 2% FBS containing 1.5% carboxymethylcellulose for 3 days. Cells were then fixed with 3.7% paraformaldehyde (PFA) and stained with crystal violet 1%.
